mapper.select:
select
from PT_USER_INFO a where a.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PT_USER_INFO.nextval from dual
insert into PT_USER_INFO (ID,USER_NAME,PASSWORD,IS_MUST_MODIFY_PSD,REAL_NAME,PINYIN,SEX,BIRTHDAY,ORG_ID,JOB_ID,MOBILE_NO,EMAIL,USER_TYPE,LAST_LOGIN_TIME,LAST_LOGIN_IP,LOGIN_COUNT,QQ_NO,MSN_NO,HOME_ADDRESS,USER_AVATAR,VCN_USER_ID,VCN_STR,PTZ_LEVEL,IS_USE_VALIDITY,VALIDITY_BEGIN_DATE,VALIDITY_END_DATE,SUB_SYS_PRIVILEGE,IS_DEL,ORDER_VALUE,ADD_ID,ADD_TIME,MODIFY_ID,MODIFY_TIME,CHANGE_FLAG,OFFICE_PHONE,OFFICE_ADDRESS,PROJECT_FLAG,IS_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT,VALIDITY_TYPE,ID_CARD,POLICE_NO,ORGNAME,ROLE_IDS,IS_VALIDATE_USER_IP,USER_IP,PASSWORD_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMustModifyPsd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{birthday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, #{orgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jobId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{lastLoginTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{qqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msnNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vcnUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vcnStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptzLevel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isUseValidity,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{validityBeginDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, to_timestamp(to_char(#{validityEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, #{subSysPrivilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{orderValue,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{addId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{addTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{modifyTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),null, #{changeFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{officePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{isSocialAccount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{validityType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValidateUserIp,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_timestamp(to_char(#{passwordUpdateDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')null )
mapper.update:
update PT_USER_INFO a
a.USER_NAME = #{userName},
a.PASSWORD = #{password},
a.IS_MUST_MODIFY_PSD = #{isMustModifyPsd},
a.REAL_NAME = #{realName},
a.PINYIN = #{pinyin},
a.SEX = #{sex},
a.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday},
a.ORG_ID = #{orgId},
a.JOB_ID = #{jobId},
a.MOBILE_NO = #{mobileNo},
a.EMAIL = #{email},
a.USER_TYPE = #{userType},
a.LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime},
a.LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp},
a.LOGIN_COUNT = #{loginCount},
a.QQ_NO = #{qqNo},
a.MSN_NO = #{msnNo},
a.HOME_ADDRESS = #{homeAddress},
a.USER_AVATAR = #{userAvatar},
a.VCN_USER_ID = #{vcnUserId},
a.VCN_STR = #{vcnStr},
a.PTZ_LEVEL = #{ptzLevel},
a.IS_USE_VALIDITY = #{isUseValidity},
a.VALIDITY_BEGIN_DATE = #{validityBeginDate},
a.VALIDITY_END_DATE = #{validityEndDate},
a.SUB_SYS_PRIVILEGE = #{subSysPrivilege},
a.IS_DEL = #{isDel},
a.ORDER_VALUE = #{orderValue},
a.ADD_ID = #{addId},
a.ADD_TIME = #{addTime},
a.MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId},
a.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
a.CHANGE_FLAG = #{changeFlag},
a.OFFICE_PHONE = #{officePhone},
a.OFFICE_ADDRESS = #{officeAddress},
a.PROJECT_FLAG = #{projectFlag},
a.IS_SOCIAL_ACCOUNT = #{isSocialAccount},
a.VALIDITY_TYPE = #{validityType},
a.ID_CARD = #{idCard},
a.POLICE_NO = #{policeNo},
a.ORGNAME = #{orgname},
a.ROLE_IDS = #{roleIds},
a.IS_VALIDATE_USER_IP = #{isValidateUserIp},
a.USER_IP = #{userIp},
a.PASSWORD_UPDATE_DATE = #{passwordUpdateDate}
where a.ID = #{id}
